content: Woody, you're not a collector's item. You're a child's plaything. You... are... A TOY! For how much longer? One more rip, and Andy's done with me. And what do I do then, Buzz? Huh? You tell me! Somewhere in that pad of stuffing is a toy who taught me that life's only worth living if you're being loved by a kid. And I traveled all this way to rescue that toy because I believed him.
author: John Lasseter
